11111.title: Coffee shop

choices: You slack off and get punished for it.
111111.content:
John applied at a few places online and only got a reply back from a coffee shop. They seemed pretty desperate actually, he didn't even have to go to an interview they just said show up ready to work. When he arrived it was pretty busy. All of the employees he saw were women and attractive ones at that.

You had to admit you were getting a bit nervous. You approached the counter. There was a very attractive blonde girl with a slim frame and wide hips with her back turned to you. She turned around with a drink she just made and as she handed it to a customer. You noticed her nametag read "Troy" Thats a strange name. You think to yourself before she turned to you and signed "Can I help you?"

You explain you are here to start work and she perks up immediately and gets very excited. She shows you all of the machines and where the ingredients are and how to open the cash register. She continues to thank you profusely. She shows you a walk in closet full of uniforms. Everyone in the store wore black pants with a black top and a green apron. "Just pick one that fits and if you ever need a change in size you can just come in here and grab another outfit." She explained. You thought that was weird, you couldn't imagine you changing sizes very often.

"Now that I hired you I am allowed to quit. Let me go clock myself out." Troy said excitedly. You raise your eyebrows and gave a funny grin. If she really hated the job why didn't she just quit? You thought. You put on your uniform and go back to the front counter to start working.

There was a blonde dude standing on the other side of the counter wearing a uniform. There were other guys working here afterall. He had a nametag that read "Troy" He shook your hand vigorously and thanked you for taking this job. "Just remember nothing is free here. Don't steal food or drinks or you will regret it. Also don't slack off or be unproductive. Management has a way of getting their employees in line." He had a stone cold look on his face at that last line as he ran out the front doors. Who the hell was that? you thought.
111111.title: Regular coffee shop with unusual consequences.

111112.content:
“Welcome to Juicy Juices! Your sexy and fun coffee and juice bar! We are excited you have decided to join our awesome and sexy team!”

John was watching the introduction video to his new job at this juice and coffee shop that just opened up here at the mall. He was young and needed a job but he didn’t think the place was going to be this over the top.

In fact the only reason he applied was he noticed all the girls in sexy outfits walking around. He figured it might be at least be a cool place to meet someone.

John yanwed and tried to stay awake as the mind numbing video played in the background. It went over safety guidelines, workplace rules, so on and so forth. John really wasn’t paying much attention until something started to move behind the TV.

“Now is the time for you to pick your workplace profile! This will determine where you work and how you interact with our customers!” The woman in the video said as John looked a little confused.

On the screen a blonde woman in a bikini appeared first. She had huge perfectly round boobs that were barely contained in her tiny pink bikini. She had light skin, waist length bleach blonde hair, and a total hourglass figure.

“Hi there I’m Samantha! You can call me Sam or Sammi! I love making all sorts of juices and fruit smoothies for my customers! I’m happy, bubbly, and every day is a party for me!” She said as the TV panned to another woman.

On screen next a woman with dark hair appeared. She had darker more tanned skin. Perfectly straight Raven black hair, very large but natural looking breasts, very long legs, and great overall figure. She was wearing a skin tight black mini dress and black heels as she smiled to the TV.

“My name is Nicole. I love coffees and espresso. I like to be sensual, dark, and smooth. I make sure every piping hot cup is made to satisfy each customer I serve.” She said as the TV went blank.

Below the TV two drawers opened up. The first contained a bright pink bikini the other contained a skin tight black mini dress.

On the TV there was also a button that said more profiles available, push here.

“Wait...they can’t be serious can they?” John asked as he looked to the clothes. Was he supposed to take one of these?”
111112.title: One of those gimmicky places

1111121.content:
Perhaps this mall was weirder than John thought. Funny what things you could learn when you dived deeper into something. This certainly had to be the most interactive orientation he had ever been in, and certainly the strangest too.

"What is up with the women's clothing?" John asked himself. "Surely they didn't mess up my gender, right"

Maybe there was a slip up somewhere that could be fixed, yet John wasn't too sure who he could ask for that. He was kind of all by himself in here. It was kind of creepy to be honest, even before being presented the clothes. Still, he began to wonder if it was his only way forward.

Heck, perhaps all of this was just a joke to mess with him. In any case, he had to apparently make a choice. He wondered about pressing the button to view more profiles, but he wasn't sure if he wanted to do that. So, perhaps it was a spur of the moment decision, but he reached in and grabbed the pink bikini out of the dresser.

"Never thought I'd be holding one of these things...." John mumbled.

Suddenly, there was a little light flash from where the pink bikini was, as in confirming the choice. The dresser then closed itself, with the TV screen changing too.

"Thank you very much for your choice!" giggled Samantha on the screen, every bit as bubbly as before. "I hope you enjoy your decision every day! Have fun and welcome!"

After she left, the screen went over some more guidelines and stuff like that, as per usual stuff to end an orientation. John found it hard to focus though with the soft pink fabric in his hands. It made him blush at it all. Thankfully if he had to take this with him, he at least had a backpack to put it in so people wouldn't think he was a weirdo.

And with that, the orientation video appeared to wrap up.
1111121.title: Take the pink bikini

choices: John rushes home trying to fight the changes
11111211.content:
Looking at the bikini in his hands John wasn’t sure what to do next...

“What am I supposed to do with this thing?” He said looking at the garment.

Out of pure curiosity and maybe a little boredom John held up the bikini to his chest and laughed a bit. He looked at himself in the mirror nearby and blew himself a pretend kiss.

Strangely in his hands the bikini began to glow. It gave off a soft pink light that was warm in his hands. Looking back to the mirror he didn’t see his reflection anymore. He saw The girl he saw in the Video, Samantha...She had the kind of body he had only ever seen online. Huge perfectly round boobs, amazing hourglass figure, long platinum blonde hair. She seemed like the kind of perfect sexy goddess one could only dream of.

“What the?” John called out seeing his reflection in the mirror. His body was still his own but the girl in the mirror seemed to Mimic his every move perfectly.

“It seems you’ve chosen your new body I’m so excited to have you joining our team!” A female voice said behind John causing him to spin around.

John saw an Asian girl standing in front in him body was incredibly lean and tight. She had long black hair tied up in a pony tail. She was wearing skin tight yoga pants and a tank top that hugged her like a second skin. She had only modest sized bust and curves but she made up for it with a lean petite figure.

“Umm...excuse me? What do you mean new body?” John asked confused.

“Oh of course! I shouldn’t say new body. I meant new life! Hi there sorry for coming in like that. My name is Lin. I’m your new assistant manager and training coach.” She said with a happy smile.

“Umm...I’m not sure what is going on here, but I’m starting to get a weird vibe.” John said confused.

“Well that’s obvious silly! You’ve just selected your new body profile when you selected your new work uniform!” Lin said.

“Wait...work uniform? I’m supposed to wear this bikini to work?” John asked.

“Well of course Silly! Those huge boobs of yours can’t go around totally unexposed!” Lin said with a laugh.

“Uhh...I think you’re a bit confused. I’m a guy who applied for a part time job at a juice bar.” John said as he dropped the bikini ready to walk out.

“I’m afraid it’s too late for that. You signed the new life agreement and you’ve chosen your new body profile. The process has already started...Samantha.” Lin said pointing to John.

John lolked a bit confused. It wasn’t until he looked down that his eyes widened. Somehow the bikini he was holding had moved. It was now attached to his body underneath his clothes.

“Hey get this thing off!” He said protesting as he pulled on the bikini but it refused to move or tear.

“I’m afraid I can’t. Now the process will take some time. It’s okay though no one will notice anything but you. I suggest you head home and begin adjusting to your new life. I will see you back here first thing tomorrow for your first day of work!” Lin said with a smile.

John was about to say something when he suddenly felt a strange and odd sensation in his feet. Looking down his tennis shoes were actually changing! The front beginning to melt away as he saw his toes being exposed and they were now painted a bright pink...
11111211.title: The bikini acts strangely

choices: John gets something to eat while still fighting the changes
111112111.content:
To say John was floored by this would be the understatement of the year. He had nearly fallen back over in shock.

"W-What the hell?!" he cried out, wiggling his toes a little underneath his shifting shoes.

"I wasn't lying when I said you would be changing," Lin smiled. It was funny. Looking at her smile, you'd think there wasn't anything devious going on, and maybe there wasn't from her point of view. That only seemed to make John angrier though. He was sure he was hallucinating about all this.

However, that seemed to be the end of the conversation, as Lin giggled and said good bye, though not before telling "Samantha" to have fun with it, not that John liked that idea at all.

Grumbling to himself, he walked away from the store, feeling the off sensations of his feet down below. With each step, his shoes were changing more, showing more of his feet until they practically resembled flip flops by the end of it. Furthermore, to clarify, the nice socks he had worn to this were gone completely as if they were never there at all. The pink color on his toenails taunted him the whole way back, and he could swear his feet even were looking softer and more feminine.

"Just great..." he groaned, getting back to his car. This made him glad he had an apartment to himself. At least he wouldn't have to cover this up from anyone there. Lin said no one else would notice but he wasn't sure how much he believed that.

So, he drove back to the apartment complex, feeling occasional aches in some places. It didn't seem to be anything too major, but he tried not to focus on it. Eventually, he parked his car and went inside his place a few floors up. By now, his shoes were pretty much officially flip flops, making him shake his head as he took them off. Gosh, his feet really were soft now....and...were his legs a little soft too?

He pulled his pant legs up a little just to see, and indeed it was like the hairs on his legs were slowly beginning to lighten and fall out. Actually...on that note, weren't his pant legs shorter now? His dress shirt sleeves also seemed to be shorter, barely reaching his elbows now while his pant legs barely went past his legs. It was like everything was shrinking on him.

He really wanted to fight this. Why wouldn't he after all? However, he kind of wondered just how he would. It was unlikely he was going to get any help on this. Guess he just had to do his best. Part of him considered just not coming into work, but he figured that would do nothing to curb this.

Boy was he in a pickle....
111112111.title: John rushes home trying to fight the changes

choices: The changes move up his body
John gets a phone call from his new “Mom”
1111121111.content:
The changes seemed to be starting slow giving John a little bit of time to think. However he didn’t seem to notice the other subtle changes happening around his apartment...

The decor was slowly shifting. Turning from a drab boring apartment of a young man into a bright and feminine look. One a very feminine girl his age would have.

In the kitchen John went into his fridge and normally would have pulled out some comfort food like Ice Cream but instead grabbed a small low fat yogurt. He never even bought those before...

Looking across the table John saw the family photo he kept of himself, and his parents. As he looked at it he noticed something was wrong. Instead of seeing the small boy of 10 that he was in the photo he was a small and shy looking girl about the same age...

His mother also looked very different. Instead of the average looking brunette he saw a total bimbo Barbie house wife. She had long platinum hair, huge fake boobs, hourglass figure, she was wearing a pink dress with heels. She looked a lot like what you might imagine Samantha looking like but in her mid 40s...

“This isn’t right...” John said putting the photo down. Was this thing changing his whole life too? The thought terrified him as a sudden massive headache suddenly hit him...

It was like someone was trying to shove something into his skull. Flashes and images began to appear in John’s mind. Images of a life he never had...or did he?

He saw the young girl in the photo. She seemed a bit older. Maybe around 13? Just starting puberty. She was awkward looking and nerdy. Her messy brown hair tied up into twin ponytails. She was crying on her bed with her beautiful mother sitting beside her.

“Don’t let those boys make fun of you. You are still growing one day you will be a beautiful woman.” The mother side.

“They said I had mosquito bites! Lauren Summers is already a C-cup! She is 4 months younger than me!” The girl said upset. She was still very flat and very boyish looking.

The memory faded as John was pulled back. It seemed so real. Like it was really his memory. Was...was that young girl Samantha? It couldn’t seem possible such an awkward teen could grow up into the woman he saw in the mirror....right?

John was about to stand up when a sudden aching pain hit his feet. Aparantly the changes were done being subtle with his body...

Looking down John saw his feet were popping and reshaping. They were getting smaller and dainty and more feminine. They were really looking like women’s feet now as the bright pink toe nails matched the feet and flip flops perfectly...
1111121111.title: John gets something to eat while still fighting...

choices: The changes move up to his hips and butt
11111211111.content:
Suffice to say, John was feeling more than a little overwhelmed right now. This was all so hard to believe. Actually seeing himself change like this and even remember different events from his past? It was very overwhelming and he wished he could just pass it all off as some bizarre fever dream.

Still, it was hard to ignore them all, especially with how his apartment was looking. The colors were starting to look a little brighter, looking really weird as they mixed with the drab old colors that were there. He hadn't exactly done too much to customize the place, leaving most things as they were before he moved into this apartment.

On another note, the yogurt was surprisingly good, even if nothing spectacular. Still, it worried him given how he had never ordered something like this in his life.

"I wish I could just wake up from this," he said with a hand to his head, throwing the yogurt cup away.

However, sparing a brief look at his changed feet, it was soon followed by another sensation. He hopped a bit as his legs began to ache a little. Looking closer, his calves looked like they were becoming a lot smoother, while at the same time looking curvier as well. Actually, his legs as a whole were looking smoother, the hairs he had on them slowly fading away into nothing. He could even see more of them due to his pants continuing to change and expose more of his legs in the process. There was even another ache as they even seemed to become longer than they were before.

Grunting a little more, he felt his thighs beginning to smooth as well, as well as becoming a lot bigger. Funny enough, his legs actually felt just a little stronger. He wasn't much of a workout guy, only doing some casual stuff just to keep from getting overweight.

Still, it wasn't like any of this made him feel any better. If anything, he only began to panic more.
11111211111.title: The changes move up his body

choices: John watches as more changes hit him
There is a knock on his door
111112111111.content:
Heading off to bed John hoped that maybe some sleep would help him forget all the horrible things happening to him. As he crawled into bed he closed his eyes as new
Memories came flooding into his mind. They seemed to come more naturally now, feeling like pieces of his past were beginning to connect...

As he dreamed John saw the girl from before. She was a bit older now. Maybe 15 or 16. Puberty had not been kind to her. She was a skinny pale girl with acne, no boobs and no curves.

She was sitting in what looked like a waiting room. At first she seemed alone until she looked over and saw another girl about her age. She was an Asian girl. However she was very overweight an unattractive.

“Hi....hi...there. My name is Samantha, what’s yours?” She said shyly to the Asian girl.

“I’m...Lin..it’s nice to meet you. Did your parents bring you here too?” She asked.

Samantha nodded. “My mom did. She said this place would make me pretty.” Samantha said.

“My Daddy brought me here...He said if I wasn’t going to make myself desirable then this place would...” Lin said.

Both girls looked a bit sad and disappointed. They seemed to talk for several minutes. Finding out they were in the same grade, went to rival schools, and even liked a lot of the same movies and TV shows. They exchanged numbers and promised to hang out sometime.

A nurse soon appeared and called out Samantha’s name as she got up and walked into the office waving back at Lin as she left...The memory ended right after as John woke up in a cold sweat...

Looking around John saw it was morning. He was laying naked on his bed as he looked around for the clothes he had on last night. They were the only things not fully changed yet...

As he looked around however he couldn’t find them. All he saw was a skimpy white mini dress where his clothes were. Along with the pink bikini that started all this...John saw it was even still glowing softly giving off a warm light.

“What is....Ugh...” John cried out as he gripped his sides.

There was a sudden pressure building up in his hips and butt he couldn’t ignore as he struggled to the bathroom to see what was happening.
111112111111.title: Getting to bed

1111121111111.content:
John grunted as the pressure got to a nearly painful level, even making it hard to walk straight. He practically waddled his way over to where the bathroom was, still as naked as before. So many thoughts were rushing through his head now, both at the pain and at the memory from last night.

"Makes...no sense....." he groaned before another shock went through him.

Making his way over to the bathroom and barely keeping himself upright, he watched as the pressure continued to build and intensify. For a little bit, there wasn't anything too out of the ordinary other than his hips and butt looking smoother than usual, looking much like his legs in that regard. It almost felt like anticipating a shot at the doctors or something. The anticipation was as bad as the act itself.

Eventually though, the pressure peaked, making him cry out a little bit and lose his grip on what he was holding on, making him fall on the carpet of the bathroom. Looking back, he could feel the bones suddenly shifting in his legs, breaking and reforging into new ones which wasn't comfortable at all. It slowly forced his legs apart, along with the excess fat growing in them as they grew ever larger. Sitting up a little, he placed his hands on his hips, feeling how much wider they were becoming.

However, he barely had a chance to think about it, for it soon moved to his butt next.

The pressure there was just as intense, and he immediately moved his hands there to feel the soft flesh expanding like a balloon. For a while, he wondered if it was ever going to stop, although it felt longer than it really was. After a minute or so, the sensations finally stopped, allowing him to breathe finally. However, the damage was done, his legs forced into their new positions, and even the slightest movement seemed to wiggle his butt a little.

"This...is...insane...." he groaned, stabilizing himself upright again.

All this was hard enough to process, but seeing Lin in that dream was also concerning. What was up with that? Was she suddenly becoming someone he had known before? He had just learned her name the other day. None of this was making much sense.

Well, at least things seemed to calm down for a second, although his radically different lower half looked so alien to him. He was still a man where it counted, but even that felt different compared to before, like he couldn't move it nearly as well as before.
1111121111111.title: John watches as more changes hit him

1111121112.content:
When John got home he was greeted with a horrifying site. His entire apartment had changed...

His once boring and simple one bedroom space was now a bright and vibrant and incredibly feminine apartment. Everything from the furniture, decor, and even his clothes had all become incredibly feminine and sexy.

“What am I going to do?” John asked himself as he saw his clothes that he was wearing had changed as well so he had taken them off. He was still wearing the pink bikini as it refused to come off. It was also emitting a soft glow that felt warm to his skin.

There was a sudden knock on his door as he was curious who would be coming over this late. Looking through the peep hole he saw it was Lin from the store.

“What do you want?” He called from the other side.

“I’m here to help!” Lin said in an excited tone.

John reluctantly had no choice but to accept her help as he slowly opened the door.

“I’m here to help you adjust to the physical changes. They can be rather uncomfortable. I’m also going to show you how to start living as a woman.” Lin said as she carried a bag with her that she showed was full of beauty products.

“I thought you meant help stop this!” John said in protest.

“Well that’s impossible silly. If you want your old life back the only way to become employee of the month. Get the highest compliments from customers and best sales for a month and you can void your new contract.” Lin said.

John was a bit surprised to hear that. There was a potential loophole out of this mess but it would involve indulging in this mess he was in. Or he could refuse and try to find his own way.
1111121112.title: During that night

11112.content:
Things were more or less okay for John Adams so far.

Being 19 years old and a fresh graduate of High School, it was just about time to really start thinking about the future. College was already planned of course, but his parents really wanted him to get a summer job, since he hadn't had one throughout High School. It was kind of a pain, but one he had to deal with he supposed.

So, in light on this, he started applying to many places. Sadly, a lot of them weren't working out. He expected that on some degree, but to be refused by almost everyone was somewhat demoralizing. Still, he kept sending resumes left and right, hoping for one to stick as he didn't really have much of a preference. Well, other than fast food. He didn't want to do that.

Still, even as June came around, nothing had panned out. At this point, he was pretty much just waiting to truly begin summer vacation right now. Right now, he was just playing games in his room.

However, at that moment, an e-mail chimed in. Curious, he put the game down for a second to take a look. Surprisingly, it was from one of the various companies he had applied to: Ewan Inc, one of the local businesses around town that was actually pretty well known. He clicked on the e-mail.

Dear Mr. Adams,

After reviewing your application and resume for our Receptionist position, we are delighted to inform you that you have been chosen by our HR division for the position. We would like you to begin this upcoming Monday at 8:00. Please reply to this e-mail if this is acceptable and if you have any further questions.

Have a nice day,
Ewan Inc Recruiter

Wow, he actually got the job? Despite his reservations about getting a job in the first place, it felt pretty cool to actually be accepted. Granted, he found it funny that he didn't need to interview. Maybe it was because it was entry-level? Or maybe that sort of stuff would happen when he went there at the time they requested.

Oh well, whatever the case, it meant he finally wouldn't have to deal with sending in dozens of resumes over the summer. He could actually relax a bit.

"Finally," he smiled as he went down to go let his family know about it. They would surely be excited about it.

****A Couple Days Later****

Monday came pretty quickly, almost too quickly for John's taste. He had to get up earlier than he usually would for a summer day after all. Still, he was properly suited up and ready to get started on whatever this company would have for him. He'd surely have to make sure he was the right person for the job given this would be the first time they would be seeing him physically.

"Okay, here goes," he took a deep breath.

He walked out and got to his car, starting it as he usually would as he began to head out of the neighborhood, making the 10-15 minute drive over to where Ewan Inc was.
11112.title: Receptionist

choices: The executives vote on the future of John
111121.content:
When John arrived at Ewan Inc. He was greeted with a sight he did not expect. The receptionist at the front office was one of the most beautiful and sexiest women he had ever seen. She was wearing a super tight low cut blouse that showed off her huge obviously doctor enhanced boobs. She had on a tiny business mini skirt and was wearing really tall high heels. She was wearing glasses almost ironically as her hair was beach blonde and her skin a tanned bronze. She had a ton of makeup on as she was putting on a bright pink lipstick when he walked in.

Walking up to the counter John tried not to stare down her shirt as he cleared his throat to get her attention. She almost seemed to ignore him for a minute before finally looking up.

“Hi there! Welcome to Ewan Inc! How can I help you?” She said with a really bright and bubbly voice.

“Umm...Hi I’m John Adams I’m supposed to start today.” John said a little awkwardly.

“Oh if course I was told you would be coming please this way! I’m Stacy by the way it’s nice to meet the person replacing me!” She said with a giggle.

“Oh...I’m taking your job? Did you get promoted?” John asked.

“No, even better, I got engaged!” Stacy held up her hand showing a huge diamond ring on her finger.

“Oh wow congrats!” John said a bit surprised. Her ring was huge it must have cost a fortune.

“Yeah Jack finally popped this question last weekend. He works here as a senior VP.” Stacy said as she walked John through the office.

John noticed something odd about the office. There were lots of secretaries and other receptionists and all of there were gorgeous model quality women. They came in all various styles, blonde, brunette, readhead, white, black, Asian, etc. However each one could easily be on a magazine cover. They all seemed to be wearing the same kind of outfits too. Low cut tops with mini skirts and heels.

John wanted to say something but he decided to keep his mouth shut as Stacy led him into a board room with several men in suits waiting for him. Each of them looked like a young professional you might see in a suit catalog or Wall Street movie. Not a single one looked over 25. John was a decent looking guy but he felt really out classed here.

“Welcome John.” A man said standing up and shaking his hand.

“My name is Jack, I hope Stacy showed you here Alright.” He said with a deep baritone voice.

John nodded as Stacy winked at Jack and blew him a kiss before leaving. Jack then offered John a seat at the table.

“So...I didn’t know this was a receptionist position.” John said not quite sure what the job was going to be.

“Well, we like to start off our new hires in something simple at first. Something we think they can handle. I would think of this as a jumping off platform. A change in life....” He said with a smile.

“Oh...sure that makes sense.” So when do I start?

“Today. Stacy will show you the ropes. I just need your signature here. This is the job contract.” Jack said offering him a form to sign.

John didn’t think much of the form. Probably just tax agreements or something. He signed the form without even bothering to read it. The only thing he notice was the ink in the pen was a dark red...almost like blood. It would bother him normally if he didn’t just notice a small cut on his hand....

“Excellent....thank you we will speak again soon.” Jack said with a smile.

John nodded and ignored the cut for now. He was just anxious to make a good first impression.

Once John had left the office Jack turned back to his fellow executives. He held up the work contract as he suddenly gave an evil grin.

“Alright gentlemen. Our next beauty is here. Now we vote on what form to give her. Submit your photo proposals and we will begin...” Jack said photos of beautiful women started to appear on the white board behind him.
111121.title: Arrival at the company

1111212.content:
Boy, this had been really strange. John really wasn't sure what was going on. Granted, he never had a job before, but still, this seemed pretty strange.

With how all those men in suits were before, and how all the women are here....perhaps he was looking too far into it but something just didn't feel right.

"You alright, John?" Stacy turned back to him as they were walking.

"Huh? O-Oh it's nothing," John shook his head. "Just thinking,"

Actually, right at that moment, he happened to look down at his right hand, and something caught his attention. Where did that little cut come from? Obviously it was nothing big. Heck he probably wouldn't have noticed it otherwise. Still, he wondered how he cut himself. Well, it would likely heal up soon anyway. Should be nothing to worry about.

In any case, Stacy took him to where he had first met her: at the desk near the entrance to the building. Right as John followed her behind the desk, she turned the chair and offered it to him.

"Have a seat," she smiled.

"Uh, sure," John nodded, smiling a bit and trying to look the part.

He followed her instructions, trying to just get a hand for how working here could be. Best he be cooperative and all. He wouldn't want to explain to his parents about making a terrible first impression.

"All right, so everything in the job is here..." she motioned to the computer. "Though I bet you could already figure that. Let's set up a log in and password for you..."

John nodded, getting ready to type. Not like using a computer was anything new to him. However, as he was typing to her instructions, there was....a strange sensation in his hands, and not from typing too much. Heck he had barely even started at this point.

"What is....Huh?!" he cried out a bit louder.

Looking at his hands on the keyboard, something was happening. His hands were cracking loudly, like something was up with his bones inside. Wait....were they looking slimmer? They had to be! He could see it clear as day. They seemed to be getting smaller and softer right before his eyes! And that wasn't all, for as he turned his hands slightly in shock, his nails were starting to get longer too, going well past the tips of his fingers, seemingly getting a more manicured and feminine look in the process.

"Am I....hallucinating?" John stuttered to himself. He...had to have hit his head somewhere along the way...

"You alright John? Ready to get that log in set up?" Stacy smiled, as if nothing had happened.
1111212.title: John begins his job

choices: Your feet and shoes begin to change
Someone comes in to the restroom
11112121.content:
This was a dream....it had to be....right? Maybe you hit your head? Maybe you were having a bad allergic reaction and hallucinating?

“So Mr Adams have you read the terms of our agreement yes?”

These words echoed through John as he sat in the office of Genentech. One of the worlds largest technology breakthrough companies in terms of medical advances.

John was a down on his luck 21 year old recent college grad. After college John thought the world was going to be his. Job offers left and right, easy access to live the kind of life he always wanted. However after 6 months he quickly discovered the truth....He had no job, no money, and if he didn’t make his rent payment this month, no where to sleep. “You....you want me to turn into a girl?” He asked not believing this deal.

“Just temporary...You are going to be the prototype experiment for our new gender reversal drug. Think about it like this. There are millions of people in the word not comfortable in their own skin. They seek out expensive hormones treatments and surgery to try and become the person they want to be. Now those days are behind us. With this new drug people can truly become the person they want to be. It can change the world!” The executive said to him.

“I...mean I understand that. I’m all down for people being who they want...but why me? I’m just a normal straight white guy. Why not pick someone who is actually seeking to change their gender?” John asked.

“Because...there is too much conflict of interest in someone like that right now. The risk of them exposing the drug to others or revealing it is too great. We need a neutral third party. A plain average person like yourself to test it on.” He replied.

“Soo....You said this is temporary right?” John asked.

“Yes. This is a 60 day trial. The transformation process itself lasts about a week. Then we will see how your body adjusts over the next two months. Once we have enough data we will begin the reversal process to return you back to normal.” The executive said.

“So I just have to be a girl for a couple months?” John asked.

“Well...in a way. Your job will be to video record all your changes and discuss your body and feelings every morning right after you wake up. We need to see and hear everything. From how the changes have progressed to any potential side effects, mood swings, etc. You do this and we agree to pay you $100,000 dollars at the end of the experiment as well as cover all your living costs during the trial itself.” He said.

That was more money than John had ever had in his life....what could it hurt right? He always wondered what it was like as a girl sometimes anyway. What is the worst that could happen.

“Alright....I agree.” John said as he signed heir contract.

“Excellent...A laptop with video equipment will be delivered to your apartment by the end of the day along with the box of pills. You are to take ONE every night right before bed. Only ONE, do you understand?” He asked.

She was currently wearing a simple blue house dress with her long blonde hair in locks that framed her round face. She had a beauty mark near her left eye which both eyes sparkled a blue color. She seemed very open as before you knew it, you were in a tight embrace where you nearly sank into her doughy flesh.

"Goodness me." She said releasing you from her hug. "We better not dilly dally."
1351.title: A house sitting position

13511.content:
Ella showed you around her house. It was a nice two story house. Multiple bedrooms, nice decor, even a jacuzzi out back. For a single woman in her mid 40s Ella seemed to be doing quite well for herself.

“So for this job I have a special request.” Ella said as she showed you around.

“Alright no problem.” You replied looking around.

“I have to go out of town this week for business. I need someone to stay here overnight. We have had issues in the neighborhood recently and I want someone here to watch over everything while I’m gone.” Ella said.

“You mean sleep here each night?” You asked. It was a curious request. Ella didn’t seem to have any kids, plants or pets. Anything that would require such a thing.

“Yes, for all intents and purposes you will live here for the next week. Everything will be open to you and you are free to come and go as you please. Just be home by 11pm is all I ask. I will leave an envelope of cash to pay for food, gas, or anything you run short of.” Ella replied.

“Where would I sleep?” You asked you noticed all the bed rooms had been converted into other rooms, one was office, the other a gym. Which you could tell she never used...

“Well my room is the only off limits place. I will keep it locked. You ARE NOT to go in there understand? You will sleep in my daughter Lizzie’s room.” Ella said with a sudden stern tone which caught you off guard.

You walked to the last room which had a picture of an absolutely beautiful girl next to it.
https://i.pinimg.com/736x/57/7b/bf/577bb...

“Wow! Is this Lizzie?” You asked stunned by her beauty.

“Yes...quite the catch wasn’t she?” Ella said with a somber tone.

“Did...something happen to her?” You asked

“She....she vanished a couple years ago. Lizzie was an upcoming fashion model online and even won a local beauty pageant. One day she left to do a photo shoot and never returned. Even after a full investigation the police have no idea what happened to her....” Ella said wiping the tears from her eyes.

“I’m....so sorry.” You said feeling bad you asked.

“Its...it’s okay sunny. I will see her again one day I’m sure. I left her room just like it was. You can sleep here, don’t mind all her girly stuff.” Ella said.

She showed you to the room which definitely belonged to a pretty girl in her early 20s. Makeup, dresses, swimsuits, etc. everything you would expect.

After the tour was over Ella handed you the keys as she left with her suitcase. You finally had the place to yourself as you relaxed on the couch. This was going to be the easiest job you ever had.....
13511.title: She takes you on a quick tour of the place.

choices: In the morning you awake wearing Lizzie’s nightgown
Strange dreams come to you at night
135111.content:
After an afternoon watching the house you decided to call it a night. Heading up to bed you undressed before crashing in Ella’s daughters room. Everything in the room looked like it was new and never been touched. Perfectly folded clothes in drawers. Perfect clean dresses hung up in the closet. Even the shoes were all neatly organized.

This made you a bit sad as you figured it was the only way Ella could connect with her missing daughter. You looked at all the clothes in the room as you realized how everything she owned seemed to be sexy. She really was a pretty girl and she knew it. What a shame. Reaching out to one of the dresses you touched it as a small spark suddenly shook your finger.

“Oww! What the hell? Was that static?” You asked yourself shaking off the feeling before you decided to call it a night.

You weren’t sure what it was but something about this place didn’t feel right. You got a strange feeling Ella was hiding something. Not that it mattered now as you undressed and crawled into bed. After this week you would have enough money to get by for quite awhile. You figured sleeping in a girls room was the least of your concerns now.
135111.title: Going to bed.

choices: You get hungry, so you strangley put a huge meal together.
You doze off while starting to have a strange dream of Ella.
13512.content:
As you walk inside, you see a couple of bags lined up near the hallway.

"I cannot thank enough for this Eric on such short notice" Said Ella. "I'm just to embark on my week long cruise and I'm lucky enough to have someone here to keep an eye on things here."

"Oh, it's no problem Miss Withers" You say.

"Please dear, just Ella." She said grabbing the last of her luggage.

"I can't stay long so I'll be brief. Make yourself at home, keep the place tidy and be sure to lock up if you decide to go out. All the security alarm codes and any other thing you're not sure about are written on a note I've left in the kitchen."

It wasn't long before the sound of a horn can be heard outside.

"Oh! My ride's here!" Said Ella, you carried a couple of her bags to the taxi. Slamming the trunk shut, Ella waddle to the door and plopped into the back seat of the cab, rolled the window down and waved a dainty plump hand at you.

"Have a nice week Eric" Smiled Ella as the taxi slowly drove away and beyond the gate. Returning to the house, you sat down on the couch wondering what to do now. Looking over, you came across what appears to be a sapphire encrusted ring sitting there on the coffee table.

Picking it up and expecting, you were mesmerize to how it shone in the light. Seeing no harm as Ella won't know, you slide the ring on your ring finger and already, it was fairly loose their. It was no surprise as Ella had fairly plump fingers to a accommodate the ring's size. Placing the ring back on the table, you decide to just relax and watch some telly. It was going to be a looong week.

info.brief_description: What would happen if a job could physically changes you? [TG, WG, DG, AP, AR, etc]
info.description:
After months of search, and nearly broken, you've finally found a new job and the peace of mind you were looking for.
But it's that it?

Someone says that a job can changes your life and how you see things, but what if your ideal place of work changes you more or less permanently in a way you could not think possible?

Ispired by a previous interactive story, let your mind space out and your hands move on the keyboard to let us know what would you imagine.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

RULES:

1.) We do not talk about this interactive story.

2.) We do not talk about this interactive story.

3.) Keep spelling and grammar in check as best as you can.

4.) Try not to make the chapters only a sentence or two long unless it's a choice chapter.

5.) No limits, but do not kill. The world is already cruel. At least let's imagine something good for once.
info.pretty_title: Can a job change your life?
